Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the Server. Whenever one Server object is created and run, it waits for connections arriving over the network and dispatches the setup to a ServerConnectionSetupHandler object

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor
    The executor pools for the Matches
    private java.util.Map<Connection,​ServerConnectionSetupHandler> handlers
    A Map with Connections as keys and the relative SetupHandler as values
    private ServerLobbyBuilder lobbyBuilder
    The ServerLobby that is currently being filled
    private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER  
    private java.util.ArrayList<Match> ongoingMatches
    A List of created and ongoing matches
    private java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket
    The socket from which the Server listens for new requests

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Server()
    Class constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) Connection getConnection​(java.net.Socket inboundSocket)
    This method retrieves a new Connection object, when given an inbound socket created by the ServerSocket when it receives a connection over the newtork.
    (package private) ServerLobbyBuilder getLobbyBuilder()
    This method returns the ServerLobbyBuilder connected to the server
    (package private) java.util.List<Match> getOngoingMatches()
    This method returns a list containing all matches that have been created
    (package private) java.net.ServerSocket getServerSocket​(int port)
    This method retrieves a new ServerSocket on a given port
    (package private) void removeMatch​(Match match)
    This method removes a Match instance from the ongoing matches
    void shutdown()
    This method shuts down the server by closing the ServerSocket
    void start()
    This is the main method of the server, which runs infinitely until the server is shut down.
    (package private) void submitMatch​(Match match)
    This method accepts a Match instance and executes it in a different thread

      The ServerLobby that is currently being filled

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server() throws java.io.IOException
      Class constructor. This method also creates a lobby builder and starts its thread
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • getServerSocket

      java.net.ServerSocket getServerSocket​(int port) throws java.io.IOException
      This method retrieves a new ServerSocket on a given port
      Parameters:
      port - the port on which the socket is to be opened
      Returns:
      the ServerSocket instance
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - input output exception

    • getConnection

      Connection getConnection​(java.net.Socket inboundSocket) throws java.io.IOException
      This method retrieves a new Connection object, when given an inbound socket created by the ServerSocket when it receives a connection over the newtork.
      Parameters:
      inboundSocket - the inbound socket
      Returns:
      a new connection from the inbound socket
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - an input output exception

    • getOngoingMatches

      java.util.List<Match> getOngoingMatches()
      This method returns a list containing all matches that have been created
      Returns:
      the list with the reference to the created matches

    • getLobbyBuilder

      ServerLobbyBuilder getLobbyBuilder()
      This method returns the ServerLobbyBuilder connected to the server
      Returns:
      the ServerLobbyBuilder instance

    • submitMatch

      void submitMatch​(Match match)
      This method accepts a Match instance and executes it in a different thread
      Parameters:
      match - the Match to be executed

    • removeMatch

      void removeMatch​(Match match)
      This method removes a Match instance from the ongoing matches
      Parameters:
      match - the match we need to remove

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      This method shuts down the server by closing the ServerSocket

    • start

      public void start()
      This is the main method of the server, which runs infinitely until the server is shut down. This method accepts inbound connections and dispatches them
